tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
I visited Dr. Chetan K. Nelivigi at Rainbow Childrens Hospital, Bannerghatta Road, at the onset of my 2nd pregnancy in April 2020. My first pregnancy in 2015 involved several complications including IHCP (raised liver enzymes), IUGR (intrauterine growth retardation) in baby, leaking amniotic fluid etc. I required an emergency LSCS at 36 weeks, and had internal bleeding post-delivery because of which I required a 2nd surgery on the same day. This past history, in addition to the pandemic situation, kept me worried and I was skeptical about the hospital and the doctor in the beginning. Dr. Chetan, however, earned my trust with time. In the hindsight, I realize that choosing her was one of my best decisions ever.

1. I recommend Dr. Chetan as the 'go-to person' for high risk pregnancies. She is cautious. On day 1 itself, I saw her studying my previous case history with great interest and taking meticulous notes. Throughout the pregnancy, she took proactive measures (timely tests and supplements) to ensure that things didn't go haywire this time. 
2. She takes time to talk to the patient about the progress of the treatment. Whenever I faced any minor or major issue (say, persistent constipation, cohabiting with a corona-positive patient at home, less baby movements, itching, sudden onset of severe diarrhea on the day after delivery), she offered assurance, lifestyle and diet management advice, and medical intervention if the situation demanded so. None of my worries or queries were ever dismissed without sufficient discussion. Her attentive, caring attitude always made me feel secure and comfortable.
3. I found her very hands-on and proactive, in terms of physically examining me, or talking to the appointment desk personally to have a last-minute scan request accommodated, or talking to the radiologist about the scan conclusions, or walking to the radiology unit herself to witness the live scan, or providing direct guidance to the hospital dietician whose diet plan wasn't addressing my post-delivery diarrhea, and so on. There were 'n' number of instances throughout the course of my pregnancy when she made me feel that she was personally responsible for my complete well-being and every facet of my pregnancy.

My baby was delivered by her on Dec 2, 2020. Thanks to her, my whole experience, including delivery and post-delivery care, was extremely smooth this time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi,
We recently delivered our first baby (April 23) at Rainbow hospital Bannerghatta road under the guidance of Dr. Chetana Nelvigi.
After doing a lot of research on best doctors available in Bangalore (like all we wanted a normal delivery!), we had decided to go ahead and consult Dr. Chetana (good reviews and a great record for normal deliveries).
Well, it turned out to be the best decision of our life! She is very professional, authentic, and absolutely an amazing person.
Very humble and always jovial. You would never feel like you are consulting a doctor, you feel like you are having a conversation with a family member.
She makes patients really comfortable with her vibrant smile (yeah most doctors just keep a pale face ) and even lights up the hospital environment. Even in the labor room she was super cool cracking jokes and delivered our little bundle of joy with ease.
We are really fortunate to have met her. And indeed no rating is enough for her service, 100/100.

Regards
Laxmikant Yadav and Vijayalakshmi Romala

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics Problems,
review: Amazing doctor, takes time to understand your problems and explains everything in detail. Have been consulting her for 11+ months now during full pregnancy of my wife and afterwards for post delivery support. She is just fabulous.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted dr.chetan till the 7th month if pregnancy in Rainbow hospital. she used to prescribe a lot of medications from the 5th month onwards and also many tests. she even started to mention that I may run into pre term delivery and started to give me medications for that as well. **** ****** ******** ******** **** ***** ******** * *** ** **** **** *** ** ** *** ********** changed both the doctor and hospital *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i have a very bad past with my first pregnancy..and i lost baby due to health issues.. for my second pregnancy i visited rainbow birthright, i choosed dr.chetan mam...on first day i felt i choosed best doctor.. upto delivery my feeling never changed...in pregnancy i suffered with Bp,diabetics,overweight,and some risk complications...and she is very friendly,and explained everything,very positive person, *** ***** * **** ********* and finally i got healthy baby...thanks alot mam :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chetan is really awesome, she makes the patient feel very comfortable through her amiable nature. Listens to all concerns/queries of patient and treats them accordingly. Cares for the patients like a motherly figure. The whole pregnancy went by in a smooth manner through her superb guidance. Experience of consulting her has been a boon to us.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am visiting Dr. Chethan for my pregnancy consultation for past 4 months. This is my first pregnancy and from very beginning, I found her very friendly and supportive. She keeps us at ease and ensures that we always leave the hospital smiling and relieved. Every medicine, every scan and every test recommended by her is very useful. She also suggests some home remedies for common problems faced during pregnancy. I strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** **** **** ** **** Before consulting with her we have read review a lot and mostly people say she prefers Normal delivery. That's the correct review. She patiencently waited around 5 hrs in Labour room to try Normal delivery and her efforts made it success. Our case was complicated and she made it simple.
We want to thanks Dr. Chetana for providing timely guidance and efforts.

Dr. Chetan Nelvigi  made my pregnancy process so easy from starting to till the delivery.

Thanks a lot to Dr. Chetan Nelvigi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Family Planning,Obstetrics Problems,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: She is very friendly and listen to her patients completely. She doesn't give too many medicines during the treatment phase. Very caring about her patients and straight on face which is a very good nature. I'm sure anyone visiting her will be completely satisfied with her treatment pattern and would want to refer their friends or family to her. Thank you Dr Chetana for your guidance and support during my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: At the start of corona outbreak  I met Doctor She was very caring and friendly . On scan I found my child has got low FHR then doctor suggested me medication that improved  both of me and my baby health condition causing without much nausea. Then on the process Fhr as well as babies growth was good. At the end of my previous pregnancy I had diabetes but this time doctor used to keep track of my glucose level and I dint get it .At the end of pregnancy  when full term I contacted Docter at night even then she immediately responded and took care of me like a family member very friendly caring and made me smile during labour pains .She and her team took care of me with most care through out my labour and even after I got delivered. 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor is highly recommended. she is super friendly and guide us in the right direction. Her positivity is her success.  I was trying to conceive for  past  4 months, unfortunately it was not happening. My friend suggested to consult her. I think her poistivity spreads into me which made me to conceive 😊. she did several scans to know what's happening in my body and all the results were okay..She provided some vitamin tablets and said " All the best". I don't know what miracle it did.. I conceived this month and  I am so happy after seeing those 2 pink lines. She is really a lucky charm 🧿.. I can assure you that she won't provide unnecessary tablets and she will understand her patients very well.

tags: None
review: I have known Dr chetana from past 7 years … she is very friendly n the most patientful doctor i hav ever met …
